comment: If you want to get an A in english 1102 taker this proffesor. I am an average student who hates reading and writing and i couldnt believe i got an A in this class. Shes very helpful and at the end you get to redo the essays you didnt do well on. Its an easy A+++++

AWESOME!! teacher she's very helpful. theres a lot reading quizzes but if you skim through the reading you'll pass them. she lets you revise all the essays and she gives you constructive criticism. If you can take her..
She is a very good professor. She is clear and says exactly what she means which is refreshing, and she will help you in anyway she can. If you don't do well in her class it is your own fault.

TAKE HER!! Work your schedule around her class availabilities. 4 essays but they can be made up. Reading quizzes mostly every class. Great teacher. Very awkward but it makes you like her more. Expecting to make an A!

Professor Aldrich is a great teacher and always eager to help. Make sure to pay attention the the schedule and read everything because of the reading quizzes. Make sure to follow her guidelines to a T for essays and you should be fine. Attendance is mandatory, but if told in advance of an absence, she will excuse missed assignments for that day.

Pretty straight forward. Easy B, have to work for an A. Made an 89 and wouldnt curve. 4 papers, if you make a C you can revise essay. Easy in class assignments that are a must do, dont miss class. Overall I enjoyed this class.

Pretty straight forward. Very friendly and will answer questions. An easy B,have to work a bit more for an A. I had an 89 and she would curve me. Overall enjoyed her class, in class assignments are pretty easy. 4 essays, make less than a C, can revise. Wish I had taken her for 1102.
She was a great teacher. Very helpful, and passionate about what she does. 4 major essays. Lets you revise all of them to get a better grade at the end. If you try, you shouldn't have a problem.

Personally, I really liked Ms.Aldrich, she is a very straightforward teacher who is there to teach a purpose. She is extremely helpful with English and thoroughly explains material. Just take time with your work and put in the effort and you will do fine.
